Name: Magic Guide
Title: Bane of Storm and Tide: Magic Guide
Desc: The 12th edition of the Magic Guide.\nIt contains a great detail of errors, but nonetheless remains the most authoritative guide to magic in existence.

Talent.Name: Magic Guide
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
